name: ailog-rag-skills
description: Professional RAG development skills for Claude Code - audit, evaluate, optimize, and scaffold RAG pipelines
author: Ailog

skills.name: rag-audit
skills.description: Analyze RAG implementations for anti-patterns, performance issues, and best practices violations

skills.name: rag-eval
skills.description: Evaluate RAG system quality with metrics (recall, precision, faithfulness) and optional Ailog API benchmarking

skills.name: chunking-advisor
skills.description: Get expert recommendations on chunking strategies based on your document types and use case

skills.name: rag-scaffold
skills.description: Generate production-ready RAG pipeline boilerplate with best practices built-in

instructions: Copy skills to Claude Code: cp -r claude-rag-skills/* ~/.claude/skills/
Then install individual skills: /plugin install rag-audit
